tool.name: SAGA.pointcloud_tools.3
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArraySHAPES False isArrayZFIELD False output_data_POINTS $output_data_POINTS name SAGA.pointcloud_tools.3 SHAPES $SHAPES ZFIELD $ZFIELD OUTPUT $OUTPUT prefer $prefer response $response outputType_POINTS $OutputSection_POINTS.outputType_POINTS transmissionMode_POINTS $OutputSection_POINTS.transmissionMode_POINTS

param.name: SHAPES
param.label: Shapes
param.help: Shapes The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, json

param.name: ZFIELD
param.label: Z Value
param.help: Z Value The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_POINTS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_POINTS
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...
